November 27, 2012, Bill worked with Kathy but at different companies

I have worked with Kathy for several years and she is extremely talented at finding the best candidates for her client’s roles.  She has the ability to understand her client’s culture and match skilled candidates that will be a cultural fit.Her extensive network and pipeline of talent allows her to quickly source highly-skilled candidates.  Her skill at matching the “right” talent for a position helps her partner with her clients to achieve their long-term staffing plans.  She is truly talented in the staffing world and I highly recommend her.

Dallas Smith
Professional Cruiser at Retired
November 22, 2012, Dallas worked with Kathy but at different companies

Kathy is an exceptional recruiter because she is genuinely interested in the goals that her clients and candidates are trying to achieve. She is rare in today’s industry because she actually listens to the needs of the client and of the consultant and matches them up accordingly. What sets Kathy apart from other recruiters is that she has a deep understanding of the business and always keeps the candidates best interests at heart. She is also very personable and easy to relate to. She is certainly in a league of her own.  Her expert knowledge of the industry and high level of professionalism make her a great asset to any company!

November 21, 2012, James worked with Kathy but at different companies

While I have never gotten to work on any projects with Kathy, I have known her for many years while searching for work in the industry Kathy also works in.  I have had many conversations and interpersonal communications with Kathy enough to have felt the genuine concern she carries for all with whom she works.  She is not only well connected in her industry, but is a wonderful person to be around, and has a knack of being able to make a person feel good about themselves, even while unemployed and looking for work.  She sees the worth of a person and endeavors to demonstrate that to her clients, and is an effective communicator.  I feel blessed to know her.

summary: Since it's founding over 160 years ago, American Express has always had a deep focus on its customers. Using Sales Cloud as one part of the Customer Success Platform, American Express has brought this same customer focus into the digital age and transformed its sales culture on a profound level.
